website_summaries.verdict: This apron is a practical and affordable choice for both men and women.
pros: Shorter length with the same width, makes it a comfortable choice for shorter people
Waxed canvas works well in a light-industry shop, or in forge applications
Company stands behind product and will replace it if you have problems
cons: Apron is pretty stiff coming out of the box and needs a breaking-in period

customer_reviews.title: Great apron if you replace the neck strap
customer_reviews.text: The apron itself is well-made, durable with roomy pockets. The only issue I have is that all the weight of the apron and whatever you carry in the pockets rests on the back of your neck - ended up rubbing the back of my neck raw. I replaced the straps with the Dickies apron suspenders which really helps redistribute the weight to your shoulders. It was an unexpected additional expense that I hope can be incorporated into future designs.
customer_reviews.author: Tire Swing Woodworks

customer_reviews.title: I really, really like this shop apron
customer_reviews.text: This apron arrived a day early. Out of the package its stiff and clearly well made. After sleeping in it for several nights it started to soften up - just kidding - the stiffness is an indication of the quality of the material. I have used it several days now and it is starting to move a bit more easily, but also I an getting used to it. It performs it's function very well indeed. I am a "wiper", and my pants and shirt would always be filthy at the end of a day's work. With this apron on, I can wear the same work clothes more than once. I really, really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Don W. Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Tore two holes in the apron on the first day of ware!
customer_reviews.text: Both of the far top edges of the pocket ripped on the first day I wore it. I had my hands in the pockets resting on the top and it just flat out tore. First the right side went and then the left. I have had this happen with cheap cloth aprons, but never within a few hours of putting it on. It seems like all the extra stitching on these two spots have actually compromised the integrity of the cloth under the pocket. I really wanted to like and use this apron, but I will be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Garret Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Wouldn't change a thing.
customer_reviews.text: I wear this in the shop everyday. Metal working, wood working, everything I do this apron is there. The pockets are plenty roomy for small tools and my pencil so they are always at hand and I'm no longer looking. The length is great for protecting my clothes but I retain full easy movement from kneeling to walking. The straps are comfortable and despite the waxed weight (I love the stiffness) the whole apron is so light I don't even notice it. And it looks good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality heavy duty workshop apron.
customer_reviews.text: This heavy duty canvas apron excellent for working in workshop when grinding, sawing, drilling when the metal chips are flying. Very well constructed of decent weight canvas with ample pockets for my needs. The 1 inch Neck and back straps much more comfortable wearing in contrast to the thin straps used on other brands. Only initial minor issue I had with this apron is the stiffness of the waxed canvas. Need to beat it up a bit to get it to get the stiffness out of the canvas in order to feel more comfortable while wearing it in the workshop.
customer_reviews.author: TGI

customer_reviews.title: The apron is great and does what I need it to do for ...
customer_reviews.text: Description and photos match the product I received. The apron is great and does what I need it to do for the most part. The only things that I'm not 100% satisfied with are the pocket arrangements and the neck strap. It would be nice to have an additional chest pocket with slots for pens/pencils so they weren't just floating around in the pocket. Also a better way to clip on a tape measure. The neck strap isn't padded or anything, so depending on how much stuff you have in the pockets, it'll start to give you a neckache after a couple hours. Overall I'm pleased with the purchase though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Neuwirth

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: These aprons are smart looking, durable, inexpensive, and high quality. They come a bit stiff but wear nicely. I find the cross back style was more comfortable, but less easy to take on and off. I gave the x-back as a gift and bought another without. Its not as comfortable around the neck but easier to take off and put on quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ra33it

customer_reviews.title: A good apron for ready (and taxing) work.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! The apron is well waxed (to the point of being stiff when I first opened it), but will relax as it is used. The pockets are well placed, the straps are easily adjusted and I would expect my g'children will be fighting over who gets "Papaw's apron" when I move to The Great Workshop" in the distant future. The only recommendation I would suggest is finding a place where a body can hang a hammer from the apron. Readywares gets it done!
customer_reviews.author: YoyoMitch

customer_reviews.title: Great Apron for the shop OR the Kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: This is EXACTLY what I wanted. I get pretty sloppy and often ruin clothes with staining liquids. Not with this on, it is waterproof and comfortable to wear also. New Year's day I would have been scalded and ruined some clothes with hot ham juices straight out of the oven had I not had this apron on. Of course, it will take some breaking in but time will do that. I highly recommend this apron.
customer_reviews.author: John E Dove

customer_reviews.title: And a super great price
customer_reviews.text: This apron is quality. Everything about it is beefy; the material the straps are made from, the stitching, and of course the waxed cotton. And a super great price. This is a classic, the kind of apron worn by generations of working people. Just keep in mind, it will take some time to break in, just like a good pair of leather boots. Its made from natural products. It'll be stiff and feel like you're wearing a sheet of cardboard at first, but only for a while. Wear it around a while. In time your movements and body heat will soften the stiffness out. Then it will feel like it was made for you. What could be better?
customer_reviews.author: RainGuy

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong in this price range.
customer_reviews.text: I love this apron. I work as a model maker / machinist. I am either casting with resins or machining aluminum in this apron. It has saved my clothes on countless hours. The pockets are great and I always have my calipers, pens, and calculator close by. The quality is rugged as I am constantly leaning against the milling machines or our injection molder. At 6' and 175lbs it fits perfectly, but all the straps have a wide range of adjustments. Plus it looks really great!
customer_reviews.author: Everett V. Goings III

customer_reviews.title: Great apron
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what an apron. This thing will last longer than I will! I really like the sturdy feel of this apron. I ordered it for use durning wood turning in hopes it would shed the chips better than the cloth does. It works great. Long enough to cover below the knees on an average height 5 10- 6' If you want a great apron, this is it
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Poor Mans Filson
customer_reviews.text: So far very durable/water resistant. Not a lot of air flow so it tends to get a bit hot when working in the garage/shop. Like many waxed cotton fabrics it is can tend to be slightly greasy when warm and when cold can be stiff as a board. Neck strap is ok but i feel like it would be better to have an "X" strap across the back since it can get heavy when loaded with 25' tape measures, tools and the like.
customer_reviews.author: The Big Bopper

customer_reviews.title: Big, Durable, Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I'm smoking bbq. It's big enough and has long enough straps to fit just about anybody. It's nade of durable waxed canvas that starts out pretty stiff but is already breaking in nicely, and the neck loop is soft and doesn't chafe or rub. Pocket placement and size seems well thought-out and convenient. Overall it's a great apron at any price and a steal at the price offered.
customer_reviews.author: Bates Nunamaker

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy apron. It came folded and I am looking into ways to get the creases out as it is coated canvas. Otherwise, it is great! I am stoked. Very good quality and it seems that it will hold up to the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent/Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bladesmith. Have several aprons that I wear daily. This one is great and cannot be beat for the price. Material is very durable and the apron is very well made. Great right out the "box". Will get more of these. Very good. I recommend it without hesitation. Just got another one.
customer_reviews.author: knifemaker

customer_reviews.title: Great apron short straps.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite apron but the straps were far to short. I had to switch them out which took extra time and money. I wish this had size options available. I'm 6'1 220# so I am large but not big and tall store large.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Professional and well made.
customer_reviews.text: My son feels like a real carpenter when he wears this apron. It is SO professional and actually makes him do better work (whittling!). The wood chips don't stick to the apron, so that makes the rest of us happy too. VERY high quality. Great pockets. One size fits all (he weighs only 105), and it looks great on him.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable apron. It's going to get a lot of use in my workshop. Love the pockets, as I'm always searching for my pencil or combination square, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality/great price!
customer_reviews.text: Ive only had it a few days, but I needed this because I work with wood and I was tired of my clothes getting snagged and torn. I also needed something durable, because it's wood I work with. Plus, as a woman, I wanted something somewhat stylish. For the price, this is a great apron. It's solid, built well and even a little bit lovely. :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Phenicie

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good company
customer_reviews.text: Readywares service was fast and the apron is just what I need. I have read reviews that describe the apron as excessively stiff when new but I did not find that to be the case. It is a bit stiff but not so much that it can't be used right out of the package. What matters to me is that the apron is very tough and I can expect it to block wood chips that otherwise might be uncomfortable to be pelted with. Good product, good company.
customer_reviews.author: Kim W.

customer_reviews.title: Great apron!
customer_reviews.text: I love this apron! We bought it for my husband for Father’s Day and he’s definitely gotten great use of it. No more stained shirts and the pockets are great for carrying matches and other misc items. Sturdy material and great coverage!
customer_reviews.author: Veronic@

customer_reviews.title: Great value Apron.
customer_reviews.text: The apron is a heavy duty and well made. Yes it is stiff but it will wear in, good pockets and neck strap with plenty wrap around tie. I'm happy with the price and quality. Buy it, it's a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: F. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: With all of the crap that I deal with at work and the oil and mess I'm now able to save my clothes as much as I can now since work does not provide proper garments to protect the wearer's clothes I must do this myself
customer_reviews.author: Cg1

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY DUTY.
customer_reviews.text: This is a serious work apron. Heavier and more sturdy than I imagined. It will take some breaking in, but I have no doubt that it will wear in very nicely. Quality stitching all around. Folds and creases from packaging will eventually become part of the character of an often worn and cherished item. I like it VERY much!
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite work apron
customer_reviews.text: This apron is great! It's definitely very heavy duty. The pros for me are the long tie straps, adjustable neck strap and the waxed canvas. The latter is great for not only keeping you clean, but dry when in messy environments. I will note that the apron is heavy, and if you are working in it a lot you can start to feel that weight. This is a non issue for me but may be a turn off for some. This has very quickly become my go to favorite work apron.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will want to wear this
customer_reviews.text: Way better than I expected. I added a quick release buckle to the back straps. I like wearing this in the shop. It is thick enough for protecting your clothes but not too heavy on your neck. I also sewed a white patch on the breast to make it identifiable as mine.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Grubb

customer_reviews.title: A man's apron
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I feel like I could start in a Kati Wilde novel as the granite abs and square jawed stable boy shoe-ing horses. I use it in my wood shop religiously. Pro-tip slide a magnet in the pocket so your screws and bits stick to you and don't get lost
customer_reviews.author: Just Jackin' It

customer_reviews.title: Very neat
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my boss, who works on his motorcycles and does all kinds of other outdoor tool-related dirty, greasy stuff. He loves his gift, and says it really does the trick. Note that it's fairly narrow (not full wrap-around) and rather stiff out of the bag, but I assume it loosens up the more it's used.
customer_reviews.author: Shilo

customer_reviews.title: My son-in-law loves this apron!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this apron to my son-in-law for Christmas. He's very much into grilling and smoking meat outside...he loves this apron and it looks good on him! I highly recommend this product for the outdoor chef...although, it can be used indoors too.
customer_reviews.author: Semmie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Other reviews state it is stiff ... it is but it’s waxed and supposed to be. It will break in like any good canvas wear. I’ll update this as needed once I get a chance to really use it. I do like the pockets and length of the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Asecretary

customer_reviews.title: This is a heavy duty apron
customer_reviews.text: I really like this apron, it has great pockets and covers a lot of the body to protect my clothes. It is a good heavy apron for working in my wood shop. The only drawback is it is stiff. After wadding it up several times and beating it with some scrap lumber, it has started to relax but it still tends to like to stand on it's own. Time will tell, definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's nice and long.
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a long apron when working on projects in the garage that involved painting and sanding but could only find short ones at the local stores. When we found this one he was thrilled! Nice and long, he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great shop apron!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Heavy duty and well made. Added: The more I wear this the more I like it. I have not previously worn a shop apron, but this one feels like it's heavy enough to actually be worth wearing.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for a neckstrap.
customer_reviews.text: Great fabric, but the strap around your neck with the weight of the garment is terribly uncomfortable. I ended up cutting the straps and changing them to an X back to alleviate the weight from my neck to shoulders. Now it's all good!
customer_reviews.author: bluedot

customer_reviews.title: Readywares apron
customer_reviews.text: Apron definitely protects when working in the shop, it's very thick and has an adjustable neck strap. Waist strap is long enough to double back around waist to tie in front, which makes it easier than tieing in the back. Great apron!
customer_reviews.author: Big Joe

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My husband asked me to order him a work apron for the garage. I chose this one and he LOVES IT. He says it’s exactly what he wanted. The pockets are perfect for his needs. Guess I did good!
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY L NORRBOM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality with a best price
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, I was looking for a apron to work in mechanic, and the aprons I can find was expensive with low quality. This one really gets my attention it's with a perfect price and the quality is awsome. I really appreciate and recomend. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Roney Eduardo Romualdo

customer_reviews.title: Only suckers catch on fire
customer_reviews.text: As I knifemaker by trade, I needed something to wear in my shop to keep gunk off of me, but more importantly to keep me from setting myself on fire or getting impaled when my buffing wheel throws something at me. This will do the trick. Heavy, stiff waxed canvas, comfortable straps, 3 decent sized pockets including one on the chest to put my phone in. Great quality stitching, plus my wife thinks I look cute in it, so that's nice. Good price for the quality, and I'm not on fire!
customer_reviews.author: Huni Szep

customer_reviews.title: Serious Apron!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, an Artist. So we are looking at paint, woodwork, glue, goodness knows. Boiling sugar at one point... this is awsome! He totally loved it and it is not heavy, but the protection is DREAD lol Very very pleased with this. The item came on time too.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gaskin

customer_reviews.title: This apron would be hard to beat. It takes ...
customer_reviews.text: This apron would be hard to beat. It takes some work to break it in, but I needed a tough protector while I carve and I've destroyed a denim apron with my tools. If I ever need another I'll be sure to look up Readywares again.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Bell

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new apron. It is still like the other reviewers said, but I told him he just had to beat it up a bit and it will feel better. I hope it lasts him a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: extremely disappointing as this seemed like a very nice shop apron
customer_reviews.text: On the first day wearing it - the stitching on the right front pocket came undone the pocket fell wide open... extremely disappointing as this seemed like a very nice shop apron ....
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Man Apron
customer_reviews.text: I freaking LOVE this apron! It is super thick rugged waxed canvas. Hard Core quality! I use this apron for butchery of wild game, sausage and jerky making. I love to wear it while I grill and cook for my family. This is a man's apron!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it much yet, but it seems very durable and well made. Love the pockets
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: An excellent example of you get what you for.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Fits like it should. Good size pockets. Quality material and sewing. I hope it holds up. Just not sure what I'd re-wax it with if I had to..
customer_reviews.author: risto

customer_reviews.title: BUILT TOUGH... OWN IT FOR THE LONG HAUL!
customer_reviews.text: Feels like it will last many many years!!! 1) Durable 2) Solid and Clean Stitching. 3) Good weight to it. Feels solid and becomes part of you without hampering motion. 4) Top pocket great for phone 5) Lower pockets perfect for accessories, some tools, hands Thanks Brothers!!! A TerBush
customer_reviews.author: AnK Ter Bush

customer_reviews.title: Just as shown! LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES it! At first glance it seems like a heavy duty welder's apron, but my husband said "it's perfect". Going to use for grilling. He does a lot of briskets & won't have to worry about getting hot food on himself!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Trierweiler

customer_reviews.title: Apron is made of quality material. Very durable, ...
customer_reviews.text: Apron is made of quality material. Very durable, and stout. To earn a five-star earning, and in consideration of the moderate price, I'd expect it to be made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: MIke

customer_reviews.title: This has got to be one of the best aprons I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be one of the best aprons I have ever bought. it was a replacement for one I just wore out. looks and feels durable , and looks like it will last a awhile in my shop. Definitely satisfied and at a great price to boot
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy and keeps me dust and mess free when ...
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and keeps me dust and mess free when I do quick little projects in the shop between work hours. It is a bit stiff, but given the material is feels thick and strong (with just a hint of waxiness), I think I can forgive a bit of stiffness.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Should be fine in warmer weather
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty apron should keep the wood chips off my clothes and offer some protection when working with power tools. Stiff right now but my garage is cold. Should be fine in warmer weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Woodshop Apron
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I've wanted for working in my woodshop. I'm 6'2" and 190 lbs. and it fits perfectly. I'm fairly particular and have gone through several prior aprons til I found this. I like the stiffness of the material, which is slowly breaking in, and the pockets work well for all my pencils, knives, small tools. Great product, quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Sactogator

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Apron!
customer_reviews.text: I am 110 lb and a small person. This is a bit big on me but I still love it. I feel protected and I love how thick it is and that it’s waterproof. It’s great!
customer_reviews.author: E. Glenn

customer_reviews.title: and easily large enough for my 6'1"
customer_reviews.text: The apron is strong, well made, and easily large enough for my 6'1", mostly torso, frame. The apron is mostly ideal, the only issue is the weight on the neck strap. I was easily able to remedy this by retying the straps to form more of an "X" with the waist straps tying up to the neck strap and being held at the lower back with a small carabiner. There's plenty of material to do this and it required no actual modifications to the garment, just tying things differently. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is a great work smock
customer_reviews.text: This is a great work smock. I can't think of a single situation in any profession where this wouldn't protect your clothes. It's distressed which makes it cool looking like you've been working in that career for years. And the price is better than others I've seen out there. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: William Durkan

customer_reviews.title: Hanging in Santa's workshop.
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these hanging in my workshop now and love it. As expected it's a little stiff when new but I expected that being waxed canvas. Looks as though it will wear very well over time and the long waist tie...ahem, it does, in fact, fit around me with enough room to tie it up. Well done Ryan and Michael. Nice list.
customer_reviews.author: Santa C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great apron - fits me well, and looks adjustable enough to fit most. Sturdy construction
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Get the one with the crossed back straps.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried both and the crossed back straps are far, far superior (in nearly every conceivable way). Now that that's settled, this is perhaps the greatest apron you can buy at any price point. It looks amazing, it's built to last.
customer_reviews.author: ShernNotSean

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!! I'm 6'2"
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME !! I'm 6'2", almost hits knees. Very sturdy, thick. This will last me forever. Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Randal Bee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks. Heavy, well crafted, and am guessing it will last a lifetime. I have had cheaper aprons in the past and they away wear out or just get in the way. This waxed canvas is heavy enough that it keeps the length of extra material at my sides where it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Now I have to get another one because the son liked it so much also
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a gift for my husband. He opened it in front of my son. Now I have to get another one because the son liked it so much also. Thanks for a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Hipsters unite!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my woodworking brother in law. Want to look like a hipster beer brewer who uses too much hops and waxed his beard and hair? This thing is it!!! Incredible apron made out of impossibly tough material.
customer_reviews.author: SuperDad1000

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and well-made. The apron is stiff out ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and well-made. The apron is stiff out of the package but should break in quickly. I expect this will last a long time and take a lot of abuse. I wouldn't mind if it had a plastic clip fastener since my arms seem to be getting shorter these days.
customer_reviews.author: HowardK

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it says.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a product like this for some time now but was always stopped when I saw the price. In this situation the low price does not come with low quality. For anyone in the market for this I urge you to consider this product.
customer_reviews.author: El Tanké

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Has a nice look and seems sturdy and comfortable. I like the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: wowyesokay

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Apron
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, thick apron. Good for many tasks, ranging from anything from cutting meat/food preparation to woodwork and other forms of labor. As many other reviews mentioned, the weight from items placed in pockets does weigh on the neck, however it takes a lot of weight before it becomes burdensome as well as being an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Haley

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for working in my wood shop. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for working in my wood shop. It is very handy with having all the pockets in the apron. The fact that this apron is wax is a plus to get rid of sawdust.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Scheepe

customer_reviews.title: The total package
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift. Loved the idea that my brother-in-law can use this for grilling and tinkering on cars. Love the pockets for all sorts of things, especially phones.
customer_reviews.author: pickwick41

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again. Top shelf quality!
customer_reviews.text: These things are incredibly well made. Very thick material, waxed canvas feels indestructible. Bonus is the fact that if you’re short like me, the lower half can be folded up and under the upper half and it looks like it was meant to do so. Haha I love this, and will be purchasing more as our coffee business expands.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine and Devin Masters

customer_reviews.title: Nice canvas apron for certain applications.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality canvas apron. Is a little still when first new but softens up. For machining and grinding, a pocketless apron may work better. (Leather may also offer more protection).
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Workshop Apron
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my husband was wanting for welding projects! Definitely protects his clothing and body! Arrived as promised and very pleased with the product and seller!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: My brother just opened his own general store and I bought this for him as a gift to wear on the job. The apron is wonderful. The canvas is heavy duty and lightly waxed. The straps are sturdy. It is exactly as pictured. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: caludwa

customer_reviews.title: Liking this apron so far
customer_reviews.text: This is my third day of woodworking with this apron, and so far I'm happy with it. It's very sturdy and just the right length for me. (I'm 5'7").
customer_reviews.author: Rayzorx

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product at a decent price. Exactly as advertised and what I wanted. I'm a big guy and a couple extra inches in the neck strap would be nice but that is minor, it works and protects your clothing just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: 100% satisfied. Exactly what I wanted, and as described. I'm a multi media artist. so Paint, stone and welding.. Don't fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hines

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Solid stitching. Would love personalized embroidery option... hint hint :)
customer_reviews.author: Southcbishop

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Lite weight and water resistant. Ovewrall good product at a fair price. No manufacturing defects noted. Pockets are good size for small items. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: W Harryman

customer_reviews.title: Buy Now !!!!
customer_reviews.text: You will not believe the quality you are receiving when you acquire this, hands down best bang for your buck with this one , material is strong stitching seems to be holding on strong for now pockets are sturdy straps are sturdy , from the feel of it this Willian láser a very very long time , completely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: CHINO

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials
customer_reviews.text: Quality materials and seams. Heavy duty canvas, built to last. I added a 1” plastic quick release buckle from amazon. Threaded the straps in buckle no sewing needed. Now the waist strap is quick release.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waxy off for best results
customer_reviews.text: It's a stiffy all right! Happily, the description instructs you how to de-wax the apron a bit to make it more supple and awesome. Thanks for the great apron, Readywares!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shop apron. Already putting to good use. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Support for the smaller companies!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality apron coupled with timely delivery and follow up. Highly recommended. Added bonus in supporting a small company which seems to keep their customers in mind!!
customer_reviews.author: Darren Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Just what I was looking for in my shop!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Karwaski

customer_reviews.title: God bless Readywares!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down this is the most high quality item I have ever purchased! I am 6'5" 265 and I adjusted it and it fits great. It's already saving my clothes. God bless Readywares!
customer_reviews.author: cable guy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome apron!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome apron!!! Love the feel of this apron, it’s nice and thick, and the adjustable straps are perfect! Going to get a lot of use out of this!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the man-chef in your house.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I haven't used it yet. But I bought is as a gift for my brother and liked it so much that within 30 seconds I had ordered another for myself. Very classy piece.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Boxer

customer_reviews.title: ... use I really felt uncomfortable The straps would be better if they were over the shoulder instead on around ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and after a few days use I really felt uncomfortable The straps would be better if they were over the shoulder instead on around the neck The Apron material is great and heavy duty I ended up buying Bucket Boss Bucket Boss 80300 Duckwear This one I like because the straps are around the shoulder
customer_reviews.author: Edward Agar

customer_reviews.title: This is a heavy duty apron and is good quality. I use it for grinding
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty apron and is good quality. I use it for grinding, cleaning, painting etc. I recommend it for heavy duty applications.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: way heavier than I thoguht it would be but I suspect this will be great for in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: my husband loves it!!!! way heavier than I thoguht it would be but I suspect this will be great for in the kitchen, grilling, or in the shop! very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Need ten more like it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an apron to wear while grilling, beautiful peice of canvas! Almost too pretty to get charcoal on. Fits like a dream and feels tough enough to stop a knife! Highly recommend, incredible product for the price, keep it up guys!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Riggsbee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it daily! It protects my shirts from kitchen grease splatters. It's very heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Concrete Projects
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who does a lot of projects with concrete and needed something that would protect him from getting overly wet. He loves it and fit great. He's got a bit of a midsection so I was worried there wouldn't be enough length to the ropes, but it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool, great material and seems like it will last. Wish the collar strap wasn't as scratchy but it gets better after wear.
customer_reviews.author: Phil P

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great apron, exactly what I was looking for. Very strong, if you hooked up a nail, you would pull it out. Not afraid to spill anything on it.
customer_reviews.author: Vadym

customer_reviews.title: Tough apron for tough work
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quickly, as usual with Amazon. The apron is very heavy duty. The pockets are very useful for carrying work gloves, handkerchief, and a few pieces of hay string. Does a great job of protecting my clothes while doing farm chores. Great product Readywares....
customer_reviews.author: Justin Shephard

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty but incredibly comfortable. It has the right amount of pockets
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted! Heavy duty but incredibly comfortable. It has the right amount of pockets. Enough to hold what I need, but not too many that they collect a bunch of wood chips. Very well made as well. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, just received today but the quality seems outstanding! Seen similar for lots more. I ordered a couple other products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Boatman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for wood working, no complaints so far! It is great.
customer_reviews.author: Keasters

customer_reviews.title: Like the size
customer_reviews.text: Like the size. It's stiffer than I expected, since it's waxed canvas. Hoping it will soften up some over time.
customer_reviews.author: caprock

product_meta.title: Readywares Waxed Canvas Utility Apron (Tan)
feature_bullets: QUALITY MATERIALS : Sturdy 20oz waxed cotton canvas, cotton/poly straps, solid brass hardware
3 POCKETS : 2 waist pockets and 1 chest pocket, perfect for holding tools, pens, or a phone
UNIVERSAL SIZE : Looks great on both men & women. 42" waist straps, adjustable neck strap

MULTI-USE : Use as a bbq apron, carpenter apron, shop apron, woodworking apron, bartender apron, barista apron, workshop apron, barber apron, tool apron, blacksmith apron, tattoo artist apron, work apron, work smock, grilling apron, server apron, work smock, restaurant apron, chef apron, etc...
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE : We stand behind our product and want you to love it. If it doesn't work out for you, just send it back and we will refund your purchase, hassle-free.
